overview: Oh, the boobs and views! When you gather four of the world's greatest naturals for the type of shoot only SCORE could produce, you know it's going to be special. For over 20 years, we've taken the greatest big-titted girls in the world on intimate shoots in the most-exotic locales imaginable. We continue that big-tit tradition with SCORE On Location. We brought Sha Rizel, Valory Irene, Joana and Hitomi to Puerto Plata, a mountainous province on the lush, beautiful island of the Dominican Republic. The D.R. is known for it's views, but it pales in comparison to the up-close and personal boob views of slim-and-stacked naturals oiling up their perfect bodies, sunbathing, putting on bikini shows, girl-on-girl tit-play, steamy showers and much more! Get to know these four girls, who have all won SCORE and/or V-mag awards, better than you could ever imagine.
title: Score On Location
